briefTitle: A Study in Underrepresented Patient Population or Regimen Tolerability: SUPPoRT
officialTitle: A Study in Underrepresented Patient Population or Regimen Tolerability: SUPPoRT

arms.label: Arm A : Boosted Lexiva plus Epzicom

summary: The hope of this study is to gather data and information about the tolerability and effectiveness of Lexiva versus Sustiva in patients who have have been generally underrepresented in clinical trials.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Needing to Switch Comparator Drugs (FPV/r or EFV)

commonTop: cholesterol, total neutrophils, creatine kinase, and triglycerides
